title: Donald Trump signs MLK Day proclamation, faces criticism from some groups
shortDescription: "Today, we honor the brave men and women who remain steadfast in their commitment to law, order, liberty, and justice for all," Trump said.

title: Read Trump's texts to Norway PM here: Nobel Prize and Greenland
shortDescription: Trump, who has called himself the "President of Peace" wrote saying he was no longer feeling an "obligation to think purely of Peace."

title: More anti-Trump protests planned on Jan. 20. Where in California?
shortDescription: The “Free America Walkout” has organized demonstrations nationwide, including some happening in California. Here's what to know.

title: Trump shifts stance on peace over Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump declared peace is not "purely" his priority after Nobel Peace Prize snub as he defends tariffs over Greenland control.

title: Trump text to Norway leader complains about Nobel, demanding Greenland
shortDescription: The president said he no longer needs to think “purely of Peace” after not winning the Nobel Peace Prize in a letter to the Norwegian Prime Minister.

title: Trump commutes congressman’s son of federal drug sentence
shortDescription: President Donald Trump granted clemency to Rep. Steve Womack's son, James Phillip Womack, who was serving a federal drug sentence.

title: Has Trump lost his grip on the GOP and Congress? It's complicated.
shortDescription: Recent votes have made it clear: While the hold of Trump and GOP leaders on Republican rank-and-file remains strong, it's slipping in notable ways.

title: EU's 'trade bazooka' on table as Trump dials up pressure on Greenland
shortDescription: The European Union has put its "trade bazooka" on the table in the wake of President Donald Trump's threats to seize Greenland.

title: In WSJ poll, voters say Trump has gone too far in immigration efforts
shortDescription: A majority of voters say that Trump's efforts to deploy ICE have gone too far in a new WSJ poll.

title: What's happening in Iran? Trump calls for 'new leadership'
shortDescription: The death toll from the Iranian government's deadly crackdown on nationwide protests continues to climb.

title: 'Dangerous.' NATO allies say they're 'united' against Trump Greenland tariffs
shortDescription: Denmark, Norway, Sweden, France, Germany, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands and Finland are casting a united front after Trump threatens tariffs.

title: Trump's second term began a year ago: How Americans are reacting
shortDescription: Love him or hate him, President Donald Trump has had a profound impact on the lives of many Americans. We talk to seven.

title: How Americans feel after Trump's first year
shortDescription: While Republicans think the president is doing a great job, Democrats are furious at how Trump has shifted the country's norms and reputation.

title: Trump made bold economic promises. A year later has he kept them?
shortDescription: The president promised to lower prices. A year into his tenure, they are still rising. Here's why.

title: Will the Supreme Court let Trump take control of the Fed?
shortDescription: Days after the revelation that the Justice Department is investigating Fed Chair Jerome Powell, the Supreme Court will debate President Trump’s ability to remove the Fed’s board members.

title: Trump names gold-medal athletes to attend Winter Olympics opener
shortDescription: Trump names gold medalist hockey players and ice skaters as US delegates to the Milan-Cortina Olympics opening ceremony.

title: Trump vows tariffs on eight European nations over Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump vowed to implement a wave of increasing tariffs on European allies until the United States is allowed to buy Greenland, escalating a row over the future of Denmark's vast Arctic island.

title: Man charged with pointing laser at Trump's Marine One found not guilty
shortDescription: Jacob Winker was found not guilty on Jan. 13, months after he was charged with aiming a laser pointer at Marine One while Trump was aboard.

title: Trump vows tariffs against European nations in latest Greenland bid
shortDescription: Trump said Denmark, Norway, Sweden, France, Germany, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands and Finland will have a 10% tariff on all goods.
